entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h this afternoon except 50 over exposed coastal sections late this afternoon. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 08 May 2016
